alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 3:12PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Susquehanna, eastern Bradford and Wyoming Counties through 345 PM EST... At 312 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Warren Center to near Ricketts Glen State Park. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Falls, Vernon, Rush, Jackson, Harveys Lake, Tunkhannock, Springville, Montrose, Dimock and Harford. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 217 and 223. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
